text: A strong argument for the religion of Christ is this - that offences against Charity are about the only ones which men on their death-beds can be made - not to understand - but to feel - as crime.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

text: Of all the men that have run for president in the twentieth century, only George McGovern truly understood what a monument America could be to the human race.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

text: Government is an association of men who do violence to the rest of us.
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: There are three classes of men lovers of wisdom, lovers of honor, and lovers of gain.
author: Plato

text: Men are born ignorant, not stupid. They are made stupid by education.
author: Bertrand Russell
